attributes.action:
Stop the building of the 
Masjid Quba on Hamstead Rd
attributes.additional_details:
This Mosque is already an establishment on Whitecliff road in Handsworth just 5 minuets away, This Mosque causes soo much traffic in and around that area and the drivers who park around there have no respect.
I am worried of the boost in traffic around so much primary and secondary schools exspecially around rush hour.
attributes.background:
The Masjid Quba Mosque is getting built on the old grounds of the famous Endwood pub, This is a really big problem due to the way the road is.
Hamstead rd is a very busy road with rushhour traffic that takes hours to get through and just to top it off it has 3 schools on or near it.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local planning issues are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
